item.title: Cleaning your Python dev environment
item.description: Is your development environment getting too cluttered? Time for some spring cleaning! First step: Uninstall everything Uninstall packages depending on Homebrew’s Python. For example: $ brew uninstall --force httpie $ brew uninstall --force pyenv-virtualenv $ brew uninstall --force pyenv-virtualenvwrapper $ brew uninstall --force pyenv $ brew uninstall --force pipenv $ brew uninstall --force mongodb Uninstall all Python versions installed via Homebrew:
